creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture
description: two lines of calligraphy with signature at L; brown mount
inscription: The Imperial carriage travels like Ming-huang\'s flight to Shu; / At first, who could have known the treachery of Lu-shan? / Life in the capital was like a dream, moving south like waking; / He had not protected the people, but only his lover. (SA)
markings: URC, rectangular intaglio; center L edge, two square intaglios
title: Temporary Palace at Yoshino
